name: Pick a Bin
description:
Game maded for bitsy game jam (theme was trash). Simple graphics, simple gameplay, simple story, just need to be played.

You are Guy, and you need to collect trashes and get to the bin (or an man). Then you will be treated with an surprise and... just play and watch.

Game was maded in around 3 days. Feel free to download and share it, but don't claim it as own.
